name: Dandelion Arts Finance Training Program
description: Peer-based skill-building program designed by, with, and for arts, media, and cultural workers with topics including budgeting & bookkeeping, data analysis, values-based decision-making, and analyzing power.
fullDescription: Peer-based skill-building program designed by, with, and for arts, media, and cultural workers with topics including budgeting & bookkeeping, data analysis, values-based decision-making, and analyzing power.
whatTheyOffer: Peer-based skill-building program designed by, with, and for arts, media, and cultural workers with topics including budgeting & bookkeeping, data analysis, values-based decision-making, and analyzing power.
howToGetIt: For more information use online contact form at https://www.artsandmedia.net/arts-media-contact Eligibility Criteria: Resident of the San Francisco Bay Area (Alameda, Contra Costa, Marin, San Francisco, San Mateo, Santa Clara, and Solano counties) Self-identify as an artist, media-maker, cultural worker, culture bearer, and/or community-rooted creative
